/about.aboutText1: FSMeet ist ein kostenloses Tool um Freestyle Fußball Events zu organisieren. Erstelle einfach und schnell Meetings oder Wettbewerbe.
/about.aboutText2: Dieses Projekt wird von der Community vorangetrieben. Wenn du Freestyle genauso liebst, wie wir, lass gerne Feedback da oder schicke uns deine Ideen, damit wir unsere Plattform verbessern können. Du kannst uns entweder mit der
/about.aboutText4: erreichen oder uns eine DM auf Instagram senden.

/account.dlgJobsTermsDescriptionText1: In the past, we took note of some looking for freestylers for their events here on FSMeet. We would like to enable you as freestyler to promote yourself.
/account.dlgJobsTermsDescriptionText2: Soon, we will release a new feature helping to connect freestylers and clients and further improve everyone's experience. Become part of a public pool of freestylers offering services like shows, workshops and more. Effortlessly share necessary information, so clients can directly contact you and find freestylers that fit their needs.
/account.dlgJobsTermsDescriptionText3: As any feature on FSMeet this is a free service.
/account.dlgJobsTermsDataSharingText1: Your account will become part of a public pool of freestylers clients can pick from. Only basic information is required to be listed. However, as clients can pick freestylers for their event, more detailed information like phone number or email address will be shared automatically on request.
/account.dlgJobsTermsDataSharingText2: The jobs feature may be integrated across external domains that are owned and part of FSMeet.
/account.dlgJobsTermsDataSharingText3: If you don't want to be listed, simply uncheck terms and conditions. This will prevent sharing private information, too. We will never share private information without your approval.
/account.dlgAccountVerificationStep1Text1: Provide your first name, gender and country in general info. Any other fields are optional.
/account.dlgAccountVerificationStep1Text2: Please note: Once verification is completed, updating any of the previously mentioned fields will automatically reset your verified status and the process needs to be repeated.
/account.dlgAccountVerificationStep2Text1: Have an Instagram profile with decent history (account age and feed with freestyle related content showing you).
/account.dlgAccountVerificationStep2Text2: Send us a DM on Instagram including your FSMeet username. You can simply copy the message below.
/account.dlgAccountVerificationStep3Text1: Sobald du Schritt 1 und 2 erledigt hast, kannst du die Verifizierung anfragen. Nutze dazu folgenden Button.
/account.dlgAccountVerificationStep4Text1: Wait for verification. This should usually be done within a few hours. We will let you know via email.
/account.dlgAccountVerificationStep4Text2: Once verified a checkmark appears next to your name in your public profile.
